nhc_headline: ...DAMAGING WINDS AND FLOODING RAINFALL CONTINUE ACROSS PORTIONS  OF SOUTHEAST TEXAS INCLUDING THE HOUSTON AREA... ...900 AM CDT POSITION UPDATE...
summary:
...DAMAGING WINDS AND FLOODING RAINFALL CONTINUE ACROSS PORTIONS  OF SOUTHEAST TEXAS INCLUDING THE HOUSTON AREA... ...900 AM CDT POSITION UPDATE...
 As of 9:00 AM CDT Mon Jul 8
 the center of Beryl was located near 29.7, -95.7
 with movement N at 12 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 981 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.
